author: Ashwin Rodrigues, Leslie Horn
title: Live Comedy Went Online, and the Hecklers Followed
description: As standup has gone digital, it's important to realize there's a difference between hecklers and trolls.
content: A heckler, in my mind, is a large, wobbling man, yelling, "You suck!" in a dimly-lit comedy club. A troll, on the other hand, is a smaller man, crouched over a large computer, typing "u suck" below a YouTube tutorial for how to poach an egg. The heckler, perh… [+7308 chars]
